description:
Quero is an online marketplace for college programs in Brazil. It helps students search, compare and enroll in programs in over 1200 partner colleges, saving money on tuition.

Follow Us:
facebook.com/queroedu
instagram.com/queroedu
twitter.com/queroedu
quero.education/carreiras

founders.name: Bernardo de Padua
founders.description: Founder of Quero Education, YC S16 and YCG S18. Scaled company from 0 to 800 employees mostly on bootstrap from 2013 to 2019. Global EdTech and LatAm angel investor. Hacker at heart, messing with web and PC stuff since I was a kid in Brazil in the 90âs. Computer Engineering Degree from ITA in Brazil, the IIT Delhi of LatAm, probably the hardest College admission exam in the americas. Dropped out of a Masterâs degree in CS to start my first failed startup in 2010.

generated_description:
**Quero Education Overview**

Quero Education is a dynamic online marketplace designed specifically for college programs in Brazil. Founded in 2013, the company kicked off its journey with a mission to simplify the process of finding, comparing, and enrolling in college programs from over 1,200 partner institutions. By doing so, Quero aims to help students save on tuition and make informed educational choices.

Headquartered in São José dos Campos, Brazil, Quero Education has a robust team of around 200 employees. Their participation in Y Combinator’s Summer 2016 batch provided them with a strong foundation and network to accelerate their growth in the competitive education sector.

**What They Do**

Quero’s platform allows students to explore various college options, compare courses, and even check the cost implications of their choices, effectively acting as a one-stop shop for higher education. By utilizing this service, students gain empowerment in their educational pursuits, which not only helps them find the right fit but also potentially saves them significant tuition costs along the way.

While they are currently facing some accessibility issues on their website, querobolsa.com.br, due to security protocols, their social media presence on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter continues to engage students and stakeholders in the education field.

**Conclusion**

Quero Education stands at the intersection of technology and learning, redefining how Brazilian students access higher education. With a solid foundation and a clear mission, they are positioned to make a significant impact in the educational landscape. If you're looking to explore your educational options in Brazil, Quero is undoubtedly a platform worth checking out.
